warezcdn.name: Record Of Lodoss War: Chronicles Of The Heroic Knight
warezcdn.title: Lodoss to Senki: Eiyuu kishi den

imdb.title: Lodoss to Senki: Eiyuu kishi den
imdb.plot: Five years after the death of the Emperor of Marmo in the War of Heroes, Parn is now the Free Knight of Lodoss. The Emperor's right-hand-man, Ashram, seeks the Scepter of Domination to re-unify Lodoss under his former leader's ban...

episodes.title: Jiyuu Kishi... Aratanaru Rekishi no Hajimari

episodes.title: Dragon... Ushinawareta Rekishi no Binnin
episodes.plot: Leylia recounts the history of an ancient kingdom of sorcery that was destroyed by its greed for power. In search of its lost treasures, Parn's group heads to Flaim to ask for King Kashue's help.

episodes.title: Kaizoku... Kuroki Yabou o Noseta Fune
episodes.plot: Ashram has blocked shipping in the port, leaving Orson and his team with no easy way to travel to Blue Dragon Island.

episodes.title: Shi... Tsutaerareta Yasashiki Kokoro
episodes.plot: Ashram and Kashue race for Shooting Star's treasure while their teams go head to head outside the mountain. When his companion is in danger, Orson is faced with a crucial decision.

episodes.title: Shihai no Oushaku... Lodoss Touitsu no Yume
episodes.plot: Kashue makes a surprising deal with Ashram, and the fight with Shooting Star begins! Who will take the scepter?

episodes.title: Wakaki Kidhi... Tamesareru Chikara
episodes.plot: A decade after the fight for the scepter, young Spark hopes to join King Kashue's forces as a knight. But Kashue has bigger worries-the duke of Alania has just allied with Marmo.

episodes.title: Hikari... Kami ni Michibikareta Shoujo
episodes.plot: Spark leads the way on the search for the dark elves when his group comes across a couple of mercenaries. When a healing spell goes awry, their teamwork is put to the test!

episodes.title: Akumu... Shinobiyoru Ankoku no Chikara
episodes.plot: The group finally catches up with the dark elves, but only danger and disappointment await. Their mercenary's true past is revealed, and just when things finally seem to calm down, an enemy invades Neese's dreams.

episodes.title: Tobira... Tsugerareta Shinjitsu
episodes.plot: Spark and his team learn about Neese's dismal fate before setting out to Valis in hopes of finding the crystal ball. Meanwhile, Parn's group learns that the governor of Kanon will be replaced.

episodes.title: Shimei... Mizukara Susumu Michi
episodes.plot: After a deadly confrontation at the temple, Marmo's next target is Neese. But saving her from another nightmare is going to take a group effort from Spark and his companions.

episodes.title: Saikai... Tooki Senran no Ikoku de

episodes.title: Raishuu... Ubawareta Saigo no Kibou
episodes.plot: Having met up with the free army, Spark and Parn share updates on the war. They raid enemy supply lines and return to base for a celebration, where a certain someone lights a spark in Neese's heart.

episodes.title: Chikai... Mirai e Susumu Ippo
episodes.plot: Wagnard reveals his true intent for resurrecting Kardis. Meanwhile, Spark-distraught by the kidnapping of Neese-is assigned an important mission to take the center of a city under Marmo rule.

episodes.title: Kaihou... Hirakareta Michi
episodes.plot: Spark's group and the free army fight to take the city from Ashram's control. But Ashram sees a better path for his people than defending their home to the death. After Kashue unites all of Lodoss, Spark heads to Marmo to rescue Neese.

episodes.title: Jouriku... Osorubeki Ankoku no Shima

episodes.title: Majo... Chikara no Kinkou o Tamotsu Mono
episodes.plot: Just when Narse corners the heroes, an old friend swoops in to fight the rampaging dragon. Then, the group must make a grave decision when Karla offers to stop the resurrection of Kardis at the cost of their lives.

episodes.title: Kecchaku... Kuro Kishi no Sentaku
episodes.plot: Pressing onward, the group splits when they run into Ashram. Parn and his friends stay behind for one final battle with their long-time adversary, while Spark finally arrives at the site of the sacrificial ceremony.
